language.msg_Not_Possible_Owner_Info: Not possible to get owner information
language.msg_findme_call: is asking for your GPS coordinates. Can RemoteTracker send this information?
language.msg_invalidvalue: The value of field {0} is not valid.
language.msg_PasswordWithIllegalChar: The password must have only numbers or letters.
language.msg_ComPortNotSelected: The serial port was not selected.
language.msg_BaudRateNotSelected: The baud rate was not selected.
language.msg_SelectGPSType: Please select the GPS type you want to use:
language.msg_DeviceLockedByOwner: This device was locked by its owner
language.msg_ConfirmSIMDeletion: This SIM card will be excluded. Do you confirm?
language.msg_InvalidIMSI: You must detect a valid IMSI number.
language.msg_ConfirmEmergencyDeletion: This emergency registry will be excluded. Do you confirm?
language.msg_CurrentPasswordDoesNotMatch: The current password does not match
language.msg_HideRT: Do you really want to hide RemoteTracker in your device? This operation can't be undone.
language.msg_HideRTRestart: To complete operation your device needs to restart.
language.msg_HelpEmergencyNumber: Type a cellular phone number to be used if your SIM card was changed. This phone will receive a SMS with useful informations to find your device.
language.msg_HelpEmergencyEMail: Type an e-mail address to be used if your SIM card was changed. This e-mail will receive a message with useful informations to find your device.
language.msg_HelpIMSI: Configuring known Sim cards you will be able to change them without receive SMS alerting you about this exchange.
language.msg_HelpPassword: Define a password is a good idea to keep RemoteTracker safer.
language.msg_HelpGPSAttempts: Define the number of attempts to try to get the GPS signal for GPS commands (except ELT).
language.msg_HelpELTTimeout: Define the time in minutes for ELT command to log a track.
language.msg_HelpEMail: Setting an e-mail account you will be able to use several commands that reply by e-mail to the address specified here.
language.msg_HelpFTP: Configuring a personal FTP server you will be able to use commands to send files to you if you lost your device.
language.msg_HelpEmergencyMessage: This message will be sent to your emergency list if you need the TopSecret application.
language.msg_DefaultEmergencyMessage: This is a message sent by RemoteTracker to inform the person below is requesting urgent help!
language.commands: RemoteTrack command. send rt# followed by
language.ehelp_command: ehelp: send this message by e-mail
language.fhelp_command: ehelp: send this message to your FTP account
language.cb_command: cb: make a call to a number
language.egp_command: egp: send GPS coordinates by e-mail
language.fgp_command: fgp: send GPS coordinates to your FTP account
language.pb_command: pb: send all contacts in SIM card
language.epb_command: epb: send all contacts in SIM card by e-mail
language.fpb_command: fpb: send all contacts in SIM card to your FTP account
language.elt_command: elt: log path and send a KMZ file by e-mail
language.flt_command: flt: log path and send a KMZ file to your FTP account
language.ego_command: ego: get owner information and send by e-mail
language.fgo_command: fgo: get owner information and send to your FTP account
language.ganfl_command: ganfl: send a list of all incoming and outgoing calls if you have VITO audio notes installed
language.eganfl_command: eganfl: same as 'ganfl' but by e-mail
language.fganfl_command: fganfl: same as 'ganfl' but send to your FTP account
language.eganf_command: eganf: send all incoming and outgoing calls records if you have VITO audio notes installed
language.fganf_command: fganf: send to your FTP account all incoming and outgoing calls records if you have VITO audio notes installed
language.findme_command: findme: same as 'gp' command, but ask you if you want to answer the command
language.alarm_command: alarm: just play a sound. Useful when you don't remember where the device is, but you know it's your home
language.gi_command: gi: get the device's IMEI number and the installed SIM card IMSI number
language.egi_command: egi: same as GI command, but by e-mail
language.fgi_command: fgi: same as GI command, but send to your FTP account
language.msg_command: msg: show a dialog box to user with a message
language.gip_command: gip: send the current IP address
language.egip_command: egip: send the current IP address by e-mail
language.fgip_command: fgip: send the current IP address to your FTP account
language.elistapp_command: elistapp: list all installed applications by e-mail
language.flistapp_command: flistapp: send a list of all installed applications to your FTP account
language.cellid_command: cellid: return informations from current cell tower
language.ecellid_command: ecellid: return informations from current cell tower by e-mail
language.fcellid_command: fcellid: send informations from current cell tower to your FTP account
language.ecallhist_command: ecallhist: return the call history by e-mail
language.fcallhist_command: fcallhist: send the call history to your FTP account
language.ftp_command: ftp: send files to a configured server
language.mslist_command: mslist: list the MortScript files found on device
language.emslist_command: emslist: list the MortScript files found on device by e-mail
language.fmslist_command: fmslist: send a list of MortScript files found on device to your FTP account
language.msrun_command: msrun: run MortScript files found on device
language.delcard_command: delcard: delete all non protected files from storage card
language.esms_command: esms: send the full sms history by e-mail
language.fsms_command: fsms: send the full sms history by FTP
language.eoutlook_command: eoutlook: send appointments and contects from outlook by e-mail
language.foutlook_command: foutlook: send appointments and contects from outlook by FTP
language.rc_command: rc: redirect calls to another phone
language.lostpass_command: lostpass: send by SMS your secret question.
language.secret_command: secret: receive your secret answer, and if it is ok, send the password by SMS.
language.msg_HelpConfigWeb: Creating a WEB account you will be able to keep your emergency informations (phone numbers, known SIM cards and emergency e-mails address) to be used after a hardreset.
language.msg_ErrorCreatingWebAccount: Could not create a new account. Please verify if you are already registered or your internet connection.
language.msg_SendConfiguration: This option will send your emergency informations to your account on the web and it will need an internet connection. Do you agree?
language.msg_WebLoginError: Could not login to web server. Please verify your account information and your internet connection.
language.msg_WebSendConfigError: Could not send your configurations to web server. Please verify your internet connection.
language.msg_WebSendConfigSuccess: Your configurations was successfully sent to the web server.
language.msg_HelpRedirect: The special numbers below are provided by your operator to redirect/cancel all calls to another number. That informations will be used in RC and CR commands.
language.msg_wrongRedirectCommand: The Redirect number is incorrect. You must place the {0} string to be replaced by a phone number by the RC command. Example: *21*{0}#
language.meedios_WrongUser: Wrong user - a different user owns your IMEI.
language.meedios_WrongPass: Wrong pass - enter correct password from signup.
language.meedios_InvalidUser: Invalid user - you were trying to update someone elses IMEI without even having an account of which you specified.
language.meedios_FailedGeneratedAccound: Failed to generate new account - a server error has occurred.
language.meedios_FailedStoreIMEI: Failed to store IMEI - a server error has occurred.
language.meedios_InvalidAPIKey: Invalid API key - this application is not authorized to use this database.
